resources.string:
1.Copy the video URL from the instagram. 
 2.Paste the link in the search bar. 
 3.Tap on search button as soon as video loads it will show you a Preview. 
 4.Finally tap on the download button.

Note: All the videos will be downloaded in your internal storage inside the IGDownloader folder.
An app which allows you to download videos and profile picture from Instagram in High quality.
